评论详情: Very pretty, would work well if I had managed the right size. I wear small usually ordered XL and still could not even attempt  to try it on. Very pretty though.
I bought a large and it felt like I had bought a small especially in the bust area

This runs sooooo small, super cute, but you’d need to size up at least two sizes, unfortunately only 3 sizes are available and I already got a large, for reference I wear a medium-large, I got a large and I think I’d need a 2XL
Its not are sheer as the photo but I liked it either way! I'm 5'2 and 120lbs and ordered a medium, so def size up. Overall I don't regret ordering it.
Cute. It does look like the pic. It was so small!!! I had such a hard time trying to get it over my head then down from there. I generally wear a small in shirts- this was really really small!!
